hypothesis_content.title: Post-Stress Altcoin Correlation Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: Following STRESS regime exits, altcoins that experienced correlation spikes to BTC >0.9 (20-day rolling) will mean-revert toward their 90-day average correlation faster than BTC price recovery, providing pairs trading opportunities.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During stress events, all crypto assets correlate highly with BTC as 'risk-off' dominates. Upon stabilization, fundamentals reassert themselves, causing altcoins with strong use cases (like SOL, AVAX) to decouple first as capital seeks asymmetric opportunities.
entry_conditions: Market transitions FROM STRESS TO NEUTRAL/BEAR (regime change confirmed)
Altcoin underperformed BTC during stress period (ratio down >15%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Correlation drops to 0.7 or ratio recovers 50% of stress underperformance
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Market re-enters STRESS regime or correlation strengthens further to >0.95

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: High correlations persist indefinitely post-stress, or altcoins continue moving in lockstep with BTC during early recovery phases.
